DataElement.preferredName: Subject Medication Or Supplement Routine Year Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator to signify the subject's routine use of a medication or supplement over the last year.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Medication Or Supplement Routine Year Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed._A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole; serving to complete or make an addition._An unvarying or habitual method or procedure._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Concepts.definition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Property.preferredName: Medication Or Supplement Routine Year Use
Property.preferredDefinition: A drug or medicine that treats or prevents or alleviates the symptoms of disease.                           :An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole; serving to complete or make an addition.:An unvarying or habitual method or procedure.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Something added to complete a thing, make up for a deficiency, or extend or strengthen the whole; serving to complete or make an addition.
An unvarying or habitual method or procedure.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A choice of Yes and No answer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.origin: OMB/NCI:Office of Management and Budget/National Cancer Institute

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.origin: OMB/NCI:Office of Management and Budget/National Cancer Institute

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A Conceptual Domain to capture value meanings specfic to SPOREs not suitable for placement elsewhere.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Changed name to match Context per Hvroje Med.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Took on a routine schedule within the last year?
